MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_250:
ImageExtractor is an Internet Explorer plugin tool that searches a website from your computer for images that meet your defined criteria. The extractor quickly downloads the images and generates a variety of views.
If you are tired of unnecessary text getting in the way of your image viewing then this is the tool for you.
This tool integrates seamlessly into internet explorer so you do not have to run a separate program to find out which site you wish to view. While browsing you simply click the extract button and ImageExtractor does the rest.
